message.entry: The RESET input must be a scalar or a vector with dimensions [{0,number,integer} 1]
The RESET input must be a scalar.
The two preferred pair polynomials must have the same degree.
The value of the Index property must be an integer scalar between -2 and (2^n)-2 where n is the degree of the generator polynomials.
The FirstInitialConditions property must be a scalar or a vector with a length equal to the degree of the generator polynomials.
The SecondInitialConditions property must be a scalar or a vector with a length equal to the degree of the generator polynomials.
The SecondInitialConditionsSource property value must be ''Property'' for an Index property value of -2.
